snippet: After the Supreme Court effectively legalized gay marriage in California, the state could see a big bump in business revenue from same-sex weddings.
abstract: Supreme Court ruling striking down Defense of Marriage Act has prompted flurry of travel promotions designed to appeal to gay couples, particularly those going to California and other states where same-sex marriage is legal; state's tourism officials anticipate same sort of bump in marriage tourism that New York and Rhode Island experienced after their state legislatures legalized gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: After the Supreme Court effectively legalized gay marriage in California, the state could see a big bump in business revenue from same-sex weddings.

headline.print_headline: With Gay Marriage Come Wedding Destinations
headline.main: In California, Celebrating Gay Marriage With Travel Deals

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
